description: Faced with wars, climate change and a pandemic, the United Nations is struggling to make an impact.
title: United Nations at 75 plagued by new crises and cash crunch
title_page: United Nations at 75 plagued by new crises and cash crunch - BBC News
maintext: The structure of the UN contributes to that toothlessness. The five permanent members of the UN Security Council, the ones with a veto to block whatever they like, are the same as they were in 1945, the WW2 victors: the US, Russia (former USSR), France, China and the UK.
